channel.title: Pages on The Droid Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on The Droid Blog

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am Arjun, the maker/owner of this blog. I like almost all things computer related, and I am a big fan of open-source technologies. I also like other things like playing videogames, doing sports, eating good food, travelling, reading, taking photos and hanging out with friends! My Favourite Foods (All Vegetarian) and Videogames Foods Videogames Pizza Minecraft Ramen - with Tofu TES V: Skyrim Pasta Halo (Entire Series) Burgers Forza Horizon (Entire Series) About The Website This website was built using Hugo, a powerful and fast open-source engine for building great static HTML websites.
